title: DEALS OF THE WEEK: Free pints, 50% off Domino's Pizzas and learn to fish for free
text:
Get free bed and board for children this half term when booking a stay with Holiday Inn. Applies to a maximum of two children sharing a room with up to two adults. Free breakfast, lunch and dinner for children when accompanied by at least one adult guest ordering a main. Visit ihg.com/holidayinn.

Slice 50 per cent off the price of Domino’s pizzas when you spend £20 online. Use the promotional code 50HUNGRY. Available until October 20 at dominos.co.uk.

Slice 50 per cent off the price of Domino’s pizzas when you spend £20 online

Order a free pint as a reward for downloading The Green Card app on your phone, which gives further discounts and rewards at chains like Sizzling Pubs and O’Neill’s. Can be downloaded from the App Store or Google Play. More info at mypubgreencard.co.uk.

Learn to fish with ‘Let’s Fish!’ free events from the Canal & River Trust until November 2. Booking required but licensed coaches will provide tackle and bait. Find the nearest location to you at canalrivertrust.org.uk/enjoy-the-waterways/fishing/lets-fish.
description: This week's deals include: a free bed and board for children with Holiday Inn, 50% off Domino's pizzas, a free pint and much more.
authors: Laura Shannon For The Mail On Sunday
